price: او (الله ته معلومه ده) د هغه دا وينا چې: زما ربه! په رېښتيا هغوى يو داسې قوم دى چې ايمان نه راوړي.
arabic: وَقِيلِهِۦ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: waqīlihi yārabbi inna hāulāi qawmun lā yu'minūna
